definition: surname Gui/abbr. for Guangxi Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The Longsheng rice terraces are a popular destination for many visitors in Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 龍勝梯田受到許多到桂林地區旅遊者歡迎的遊覽景點。

sentences.english: The aim of this paper was to study the performances of Eureka lemon introduction in Northern Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 研究尤力克檸檬在廣西桂林地區的引種表現。
